definitions.definition: a woman on her wedding day, or just before or just after it

examples.text: a toast to the **bride and groom**
The bride wore an elegant gown of ivory satin.
He introduced us to his new bride.
The bride looked radiant in an ivory gown.
The bride's father traditionally walks with her to the altar to give her away.
You may now kiss the bride.

wordOrigin: Old English brȳd, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch bruid and German Braut.
